title: (x) York Peppermint Pattie logo - custom lettered {Yves}
content: Does anyone know what the font is called that was used to spell "York"? Thanks. ![York Peppermint Pattie](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142505im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/51382.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: It's highly unlikely this is a font, it probably is a custom designed logo.
